description: This Java class serves as a centralized exception handler within a Spring Boot application. It handles specific validation-related exceptions (`MethodArgumentNotValidException` and `ConstraintViolationException`) and converts them into `ProblemDetail` responses with appropriate HTTP status and error information.

classes.name: RestExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring REST controller advice class that handles validation exceptions and returns standardized error responses.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException and constructs a detailed ProblemDetail object with validation errors.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolation
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException and constructs a ProblemDetail object with violation details.
